subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Third-seeded Marquette came back from 5 points down with 28 seconds remaining to beat Davidson. Earlier in the day, Butler held off a late rally by Bucknell.
snippet: Third-seeded Marquette came back from 5 points down with 28 seconds remaining to beat Davidson. Earlier in the day, Butler held off a late rally by Bucknell.
